text: Proud to see 9 UAMS physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 💪🏼👨‍⚕️👩‍⚕️ They represent the top 1% of hip and knee surgeons, top 3% of orthopedic surgery teams, and top 5% of gastrointestinal and general surgery teams nationwide! 💥🎉 Their dedication to innovative research is a testament to UAMS' commitment to providing cutting-edge healthcare.
